headline: 5 Top Cyclical Stocks to Buy Now
summary: Tom Yeung here with this week’s Sunday Digest. In 2022, commodity stocks were in trouble. The U.S. had just posted two quarterly GDP declines — a first since the COVID-19 recession — and people were forecasting even more trouble. Shares of economically sensitive companies like copper miner Freeport–McMoRan Inc. (FCX) fell as much as 50%. InvestorPlace - Stock Market News, Stock Advice & Trading Tips Yet, InvestorPlace Senior Analyst Eric Fry – our global macro specialist –saw things differently.
